predicate.note: Frames file for 'disrespect' based on sentences in ECTB. Comparison to 'respect'. No VN entry.

roleset.name: show no respect or regard for

role.descr: theme, thing no respect shown for

example.name: transitive
example.text: This is a practice that [*T*-20] disrespects the agreement between the two associations .
example.arg: the agreement between the two associations
